content.office: Office of the Dean Academic & Examinations
content.notice: This is to inform all UG and Dual Degree (2nd & 4th Semester) students appearing for the Even Semester End Term Examination, scheduled to begin on 25th May 2023, that the Admit Cards for the said Examination can be printed from their respective MIS Accounts as per the schedule mentioned below.

exam_details.exam_name: Even Semester End Term Examination of UG and Dual 2nd & 4th Semester Students

instructions: No student will be able to print their Admit Card before or after the above-mentioned schedule.
All students are hereby instructed to bring their Admit Cards to the Examination Hall when appearing for the examination and obtain the invigilator's endorsement in the designated place.
Students without their respective Admit Cards will be debarred from appearing in the Examinations.
copy_to: All HoDs for kind information and necessary action, please.
Associate Dean (UG & PG) for kind information.
The System Administrator, NIT Agartala. He is requested to upload the Notification to the Institute Website.
